body:
As Voat is preparing to shut down shortly, I feel it needs to be said that Voat refugees are always welcome here in +WhiteGenocide. I am the creator and original moderator here, and have been somewhat active on both Ruqqus and Voat for several months now with the same username. I have added @Hyperborean as a mod as well in an effort to prevent any type of siege or undermining of this guild's moderation. Ruqqus may not be Voat, but so long as the site owners allow it, I will commit to NEVER censor any form of free speech here. Spam is an exception that will be dealt with on an individual basis as needed, but otherwise, I will let the community self regulate as it should through votes. You have my word, for what it's worth, that you can speak your mind freely here, and I encourage that you do so. Please try to keep topics in some way relevant to the Guild description, or derivatives of that theme. In a world where the White community and society is increasingly demonized and marginalized, it is absolutely vital to allow and encourage free discussion and realization of this phenomenon, and who is supporting it. 

In the spirit of growing like-minded communities here, I will also allow ONE post per guild referring users to another ideologically related guild here on Ruqqus, should anyone wish to promote a related guild. Pease do not abuse this. 

Welcome Goats and all others who have noticed that White Genocide is far more than a conspiracy theory!

body:
I think free speech died on Ruqqus today, seriously considering quitting the site. 

Not worth the bullshit of "Oh but admins woke up today and said because of the news story they read about, they're going to turn off the ability for new people to join, and start limiting what can appear in all/trending based on the activity level of the person who created the guild in which you're trying to post - so somebody like Klenvastargan who sits online all day will totally dominate and you'll just never again see anything from +dolphins"

At worst, it's outright censorship - at "best" it's an attempt to monetize the site for power-users to dominate the narrative. Either way, it's losing my interest quickly.

Perhaps my understanding will change in the future, but if you've ever used Voat, by now you're accustomed to regular downtime, which I've fortunately never encountered here. Let's keep it that way.
Edit: you also conveniently left out the "I" that came before that statement.

Not worth the bullshit of "Oh but admins woke up today and said because of the news story they read about, they're going to turn off the ability for new people to join, and start limiting what can appear in all/trending based on the activity level of the person who created the guild in which you're trying to post - so somebody like Klenvastargan who sits online all day will totally dominate and you'll just never again see anything from +dolphins"

body:
In "extra-Reddity" ways, it doesn't even just try to hide porn or even "hatespeech", it literally just hides things posted to +Golf or +Iran or +Browncoats or +ItsOkayToBeMale because they're run by lackadaisical GMs or don't have GMs...and will never attract GMs, since even if I go post in +Golf to get great conversations going, sharing my own photos, ranking courses, etc...none of you will ever see it on All/Trending and think "oh neat, a golf guild".

It's extra-Reddity because they're just empowering a "super-user" class whose guilds will have value, and 90% of guilds will have no value and be unable to gain value even if a couple of us start posting in them daily.

body:
Calling attention to a real, harmful phenomenon is not racism, it's reality. Have you noticed how there is a widespread push for "diversity" and advocation on behalf of minorities, who are thought to be under represented in the population and thus unable to adequately fend for themselves without the consideration of outside groups and populations? This "woke" attitude that minorities must be equally represented in all groups (even far past their representative percentage in actual society) is poisoning corporate America and the education system, and in turn trickles down to the population through advertising, opinionated articles written as fact, educational courses that tie completely unrelated identity politics to academic material, etc. Ultimately, what we end up with is not equality, but sameness. The unfortunate byproduct of this phenomenon is that in every one of these cases, White people, particularly White males, are seen as the oppressors based on a misrepresented portrayal of history. The holocaust and the Jewish Question ties heavily into this, as few groups try to undermine and demonize White males and "the patriarchy" more so than modern Jews. Many of us don't hate Jews, but the sad reality is that many Jews hate us, and wish us ill, if not entirely dead and gone. It ultimately
 becomes a matter of self- preservation to call out this occurrence for what it is when we see it happening. Many examples (and you will find dozens if not hundreds of examples of this here via social media screenshots) of "fellow White people" publicly talking down to Whites and openly advocating for the destruction of our society and culture, both passively, and actively (through the funding of pornography, promotion of mass immigration and misceganation, etc) are admittedly not White, but Jewish. White people are the only people whose sharing of a strong common identity and culture is looked down on in modern society. The holocaust, and American slavery are two main reasons used to justify the demonization of Whites as oppressors, and therefore unfit to hold power or even a strong culture and identity. The fact is, the holocaust has been grossly exaggerated for the gain of the Jewish people (i.e. global domination of banking, business, entertainment industries, the 500,000,000 we just signed over to them as our own people are evicted and starving, etc), and the majority of slave traders and owners in the Antebellum South were Jews. But, this group is about Whites, not Jews. The Obama Presidency as well as the more recent BLM identity politics color war instigated to prevent an otherwise inevitable class war against the elite wealthy class have also exacerbated the belief among non Whites that we owe a debt that can essentially never be fully repaid to the rest of the population. When every other culture besides Whites are allowed to have "pride" and proudly demonstrate and exhibit their common racial and cultural ties in public ways, an unfortunate but very real rift is created. At a certain point, when everyone else believes Whites (and not the mega wealthy, whether Jewish or not) to be the common enemy of their own success, no one is left to advocate for Whites, or even tolerate our success and continued existence. So, we absolutely must be the ones to advocate for ourselves because no one else will. This means calling out each and every example of unfair prejudice against White people, which is becoming more and more common. The idea that Whites are over represented in government and business and are inherently privileged is true, if by Whites, you mean modern Jews. Otherwise, actual statistics denote the opposite. Strong White males, White families, and our culture are in rapid decline. So, we must do what we can to bring awareness to this phenomenon, and do what we can to prevent it.

post.body:
As Voat is preparing to shut down shortly, I feel it needs to be said that Voat refugees are always welcome here in +WhiteGenocide. I am the creator and original moderator here, and have been somewhat active on both Ruqqus and Voat for several months now with the same username. I have added @Hyperborean as a mod as well in an effort to prevent any type of siege or undermining of this guild's moderation. Ruqqus may not be Voat, but so long as the site owners allow it, I will commit to NEVER censor any form of free speech here. Spam is an exception that will be dealt with on an individual basis as needed, but otherwise, I will let the community self regulate as it should through votes. You have my word, for what it's worth, that you can speak your mind freely here, and I encourage that you do so. Please try to keep topics in some way relevant to the Guild description, or derivatives of that theme. In a world where the White community and society is increasingly demonized and marginalized, it is absolutely vital to allow and encourage free discussion and realization of this phenomenon, and who is supporting it. 

In the spirit of growing like-minded communities here, I will also allow ONE post per guild referring users to another ideologically related guild here on Ruqqus, should anyone wish to promote a related guild. Pease do not abuse this. 

Welcome Goats and all others who have noticed that White Genocide is far more than a conspiracy theory!

body:
>All section that doesn't show everything by default

Maybe I'll keep pushing for an "unfiltered all" even though the admins said they were kind of iffy on it the last time I asked.

Edit: SaidIt also hides subs from /s/all, but it has /subs/notall. I know the admins really want guilds to be categorized, but like u_MaxwellHill, I don't want guilds with inactive GMs to become too negatively affected by this. The admins say they could categorize them themselves, but that doesn't sound too feasible considering the amount of guilds on ruqqus. The main page could have only categorized guilds (and explicitly say that\*), while a separate "unfiltered all" could be like the one we used to have.

Rather than punishing subs like this for not being categorized, maybe there should be some other incentive to do it (I can't think of anything other than free coins though).

\*"This is the All page. Only guilds in categories you've chosen will appear here. Go to (wherever it is because I have no idea where it is on mobile) to choose the categories you want to see. Political guilds and uncategorized guilds are hidden by default."

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

parent.body:
Calling attention to a real, harmful phenomenon is not racism, it's reality. Have you noticed how there is a widespread push for "diversity" and advocation on behalf of minorities, who are thought to be under represented in the population and thus unable to adequately fend for themselves without the consideration of outside groups and populations? This "woke" attitude that minorities must be equally represented in all groups (even far past their representative percentage in actual society) is poisoning corporate America and the education system, and in turn trickles down to the population through advertising, opinionated articles written as fact, educational courses that tie completely unrelated identity politics to academic material, etc. Ultimately, what we end up with is not equality, but sameness. The unfortunate byproduct of this phenomenon is that in every one of these cases, White people, particularly White males, are seen as the oppressors based on a misrepresented portrayal of history. The holocaust and the Jewish Question ties heavily into this, as few groups try to undermine and demonize White males and "the patriarchy" more so than modern Jews. Many of us don't hate Jews, but the sad reality is that many Jews hate us, and wish us ill, if not entirely dead and gone. It ultimately
 becomes a matter of self- preservation to call out this occurrence for what it is when we see it happening. Many examples (and you will find dozens if not hundreds of examples of this here via social media screenshots) of "fellow White people" publicly talking down to Whites and openly advocating for the destruction of our society and culture, both passively, and actively (through the funding of pornography, promotion of mass immigration and misceganation, etc) are admittedly not White, but Jewish. White people are the only people whose sharing of a strong common identity and culture is looked down on in modern society. The holocaust, and American slavery are two main reasons used to justify the demonization of Whites as oppressors, and therefore unfit to hold power or even a strong culture and identity. The fact is, the holocaust has been grossly exaggerated for the gain of the Jewish people (i.e. global domination of banking, business, entertainment industries, the 500,000,000 we just signed over to them as our own people are evicted and starving, etc), and the majority of slave traders and owners in the Antebellum South were Jews. But, this group is about Whites, not Jews. The Obama Presidency as well as the more recent BLM identity politics color war instigated to prevent an otherwise inevitable class war against the elite wealthy class have also exacerbated the belief among non Whites that we owe a debt that can essentially never be fully repaid to the rest of the population. When every other culture besides Whites are allowed to have "pride" and proudly demonstrate and exhibit their common racial and cultural ties in public ways, an unfortunate but very real rift is created. At a certain point, when everyone else believes Whites (and not the mega wealthy, whether Jewish or not) to be the common enemy of their own success, no one is left to advocate for Whites, or even tolerate our success and continued existence. So, we absolutely must be the ones to advocate for ourselves because no one else will. This means calling out each and every example of unfair prejudice against White people, which is becoming more and more common. The idea that Whites are over represented in government and business and are inherently privileged is true, if by Whites, you mean modern Jews. Otherwise, actual statistics denote the opposite. Strong White males, White families, and our culture are in rapid decline. So, we must do what we can to bring awareness to this phenomenon, and do what we can to prevent it.
